1.title: The Honeymoon Is Over
1.plot: An arctic community battles a harsh polar freeze: Stephan and Allyce must save their aging boat as Pike Mike combats glacial winds. Newbies Kyle & Peyton race to build their home while Gary must save his daughter's barge from sinking.

2.title: Alone in the Wild
2.plot: The lake transition from icy water to solid ice brings major decisions. A bigger home means isolation for Stephan & Allyce. Kyle & Peyton have no clue how to move their new barge. A lost visitor plunges Ragnar into the arctic tundra to save a life.

3.title: Far & Away
3.plot: Stephan & Allyce's remote cabin makes their dog Dora a target for wolves. As subzero weather batters their makeshift tent, Kyle & Peyton improvise to stay warm. Pike Mike takes off-grid living to a new level & teaches Molly arctic survival skills.

4.title: Of Ice and Skins
4.plot: Winter means no rest in the frozen north. Kyle & Peyton use native ways to cure meat & preserve a hide; Molly builds a water pump so she will not have to drill into 6-feet of ice; & Stephan & Allyce discover the water on their lake is contaminated.

5.title: Ice Lake Ingenuity
5.plot: The lack of fish & a new neighbor threaten Pike Mike's food supply & peace of mind. Stephan helps Molly install a wind turbine during an ice storm; and Ragnar uses the harsh weather to locate and unearth arctic diamonds from a secret location.

6.title: Slipping and Sliding
6.plot: Temperatures rise & the lake will soon melt into perilous ice flows. Stephan faces a dangerous trek as ice becomes slush. Kyle & Peyton seek shelter to save their boat from ruin & Pike Mike is injured in deep woods with no place to turn for help.

7.title: Breaking Up is Hard to Do
7.plot: Great Slave Lake is a minefield of melting ice. A truck sinks into the lake; Stephan & Allyce cut their boat free & keep it from being crushed then face a pack of wolves. Kyle abandons a snow mobile & struggles to get home amidst the chaos.

8.title: Fire and Water
8.plot: The lake has thawed but conditions are still a threat. Pike Mike falls into perilously cold water & has minutes to be rescued. Kyle & Peyton find a bear near their home & reconsider houseboat living. Stephan causes a fire that may destroy everything.

9.title: Live Free and Thrive
9.plot: With spring's arrival, the house boaters reflect on six months' of harsh winter. Pike Mike tries to move back to Great Slave Lake. Stephan & Allyce explore the wilderness near their new home & Henry needs help to recover from major heart surgery.

1.title: Winter Is Coming
1.plot: House-boaters prepare their homes for the brutal winter as Canada's Great Slave Lake freezes-up. Stephan and Allyce scramble to save their sinking home. New residents Iman and Jessica panic after a brush with death in the icy waters. Randy needs to hunt moose for his family. "Pike" Mike battles a dangerous storm.

2.title: Fight for Food
2.plot: The rebels must stock up on food for the long winter now that the lake is freshly frozen over. With one failed caribou hunt behind him, Randy attempts another hunting trip with an elder chief by his side in search of the last caribou of the season.

3.title: The Lake Is a Bear
3.plot: The winter storms have passed, but food needed to survive the remaining winter days is scarce. Ragnar hunts down a Great Slave Lake Black bear. Stephan and Allyce voyage to the open lake in search of fish. Randy uses his ingenuity to set snares.

4.title: 40 Below and Missing
4.plot: Randy takes his kids hunting and teaches them about the dangers of the lake. Stephan and Bryan go missing on an overnight fishing expedition in -40 temperatures. Stephan's fiancé Allyce raises a major search party to find him.

5.title: Cold Snap
5.plot: With temperatures plummeting to below 50, Stephan and Allyce return to their houseboat from a fishing expedition to find they have a frozen house no heat and all their plumbing lines quickly breaking apart.

6.title: Ice Lake Games
6.plot: With breakup of the lake on the horizon, our Rebels battle "cabin fever" by honing their survival skills at an annual 'lake games' where fire building, axe throwing, toboggan pulling and more are put to the test pitting expertise against ingenuity.

7.title: Sink or Swim
7.plot: Tensions rise as one of the most deadly times of the year approaches- the thaw. As the ice softens, Brian falls through.

8.title: Cracks in the Ice
8.plot: High winds start to break up the ice. Stephan and Allyce use a motorboat to break up large ice sheets into smaller chunks. Gary and Molly batten down the hatches against the high winds but the Molly Barge breaks loose!

9.title: The Big Move
9.plot: Spring finally thaws Great Slave Lake, and the rebels adjust to water now under their homes. Stephan and Allyce finally tie the knot, ice lake style. Molly is left to fend for herself and 3 barges. Pike Mike moves to a remote part of the bay.

10.title: Behind the Ice
10.plot: Spring is here and now the Rebels are faced with 24 hours of sunlight and going crazy. They black out doors, windows, cracks, anything to get some dark into their lives. Meanwhile Brian finally tries to set his first spring fishing lines.

imdb.title: Ice Lake Rebels
plot: A small community of people that want to live free and completely self sufficient, and survive the lakes deep freeze and sub-zero temperatures. They can anchor anywhere, tax free.::Michelle Hiatt
